poem:
**Measured Resolve**

In the shadow of iron,  
words wade through  
the air, a careful stitch  
on a torn flag.  

Deserts whisper history;  
a silent dance behind walls  
of sunlit tension.  

Not seeking,  
yet holding  
the ground beneath  
our feet—firm,  
an unbidden resolve  
rests in the heartbeats  
of cautious eyes.
